customTransferLimitMessagesEnabled.description: Whether to enable custom messages for transfer limits

displayTransferLimitOnError.description: Whether to display transfer limits when an error occurs

showShareLoanIds.description: Whether to show share and loan IDs

limtInExcessTransferToCards.description: Whether to limit excess transfers to cards

scheduledTransferIsOpenEndDateDisabledFo.description: Whether the no end date option is disabled for daily scheduled transfers

allowLoanToLoanTransfers.description: Whether to allow transfers between loans

mortgageLoanCategories.description: List of loan categories that should be treated as mortgage loans

hideEndDateOption.description: Whether to hide the end date option for scheduled transfers

allowPaymentsGreaterThanPayoffAmount.description: Whether to allow scheduled payments greater than the payoff amount

shouldHidePreviousBalanceAndPreviousAvai.description: Whether to hide previous balance and available amount on transfer result screen

groupAdditionalTransferOptions.description: Whether to group additional transfer options in an expandable area

allowBalanceTransferBetweenCreditCards.description: Whether to allow balance transfers between credit cards

creditCardBalanceTransfersSendAsSecureMe.description: Whether to send credit card balance transfers as secure messages

creditCardBalanceTransfersRecipientEmail.description: Recipient email address for credit card balance transfers

allowEBalconTransfersBetweenCreditCards.description: Whether to allow credit card balance transfers using PSCU E-Balcon

allowAdjustedToBalanceOnMortgageTransfer.description: Whether to allow adjusted 'ToBalance' calculation for mortgages by subtracting interest due

mortgageTransfersCategoriesForAdjustedTo.description: Categories of mortgages to consider when calculating adjusted 'ToBalance'

suffixLabelEnabled.description: Whether to show suffix for each account in transfers

postTransferNavigationOptionsEnabled.description: Whether to show navigation options after a transfer

transLoanCollateralForBal.description: Categories of mortgages for calculating 'ToBalance' considering interest due

showTodaysDateOnTransferReceipt.description: Whether to show today's date on transfer receipts

showTransferDescriptionOnTransferReceipt.description: Whether to show transfer description on transfer receipts

getHouseholdingAccountsEnabled.description: Whether to enable getting household accounts

allowCreditCardTransfer.description: Whether to allow credit card transfers

allowedTransferToAccountCategories.description: Categories of accounts that can receive transfers

allowedTransferFromAccountCategories.description: Categories of accounts that can send transfers

nonOlbMemberEnabled.description: Whether to enable scheduled transfers for non-OLB members

quickActionEnabled.description: Whether to enable quick action transfers

quickActionToAndFromEnabled.description: Whether to enable separate To/From options for quick action transfers
